name: Radiant Exoskeleton
desc:
A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulate their exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow over long years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they can still command them at will like any other physical part.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 60+ Radiant Beasts

customize.name: Radiant Antelope
customize.desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
Strange lightning once fell upon the land blessed by moonlight, causing once ordinary antelopes to gain the power to wield lightning. They say that some have seen a truly strange sight â€” antelopes standing on cliffs at the convergence of a storm, attracting bolts of lightning to temper their bodies.

customize.name: Radiant Bladehorn
customize.desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
It is said that in the ancient past, when these borderlands were still shrouded by the pitch-dark shadow, only the charging of the giant rhinos could return the power that makes all things turn... And this was all that was asked of them in return for the moonlight shining down its blessings.

customize.name: Radiant Lunapod
customize.desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
Legend has it that when the waves of calamity rolled over the land, even those animals who dwelled in the Forsaken Sea were not spared. Those who could not accept the moonlight into themselves vanished like foam, whether great sea serpents who could send waves skyward, or single-eyed monsters who once plotted to consume all things.

customize.name: Radiant Exoskeleton
customize.desc:
A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulate their exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow over long years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they can still command them at will like any other physical part.

customize.name: Masterless Starglitter
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

customize.name: Radiant Exoskeleton
customize.desc:
A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulate their exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow over long years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they can still command them at will like any other physical part.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Glowing Remains
customize.desc:
A faintly glowing piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is the remains of an exoskeleton in which a vestige of the ancient power of the moon still lingers. It emanates a deep hue that still lingers long after being separated from its body, steeped as it is in the power of the moon.

customize.name: Reliquary of Truth
customize.desc: An angular box carved from gold and jade. Legend has it that it was once enshrined in a temple deep within Tulaytullah, the Sapphire City.

customize.name: Etherlight Spindlelute
customize.desc: A lute whose golden strings are as radiant as sunlight. It appears to be a relic from the Seelie of old.

customize.name: Master Key
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword with a razor-sharp blade. Power is a key that can open almost any lock.

customize.name: Moonweaver's Dawn
customize.desc: An immaculate, sharp silver sword that can slice through armor like moonlight flowing through the empty night. According to legend, it is a divine blade, blessed by the first Moonchanter herself.

customize.name: Lightless Bone
customize.desc:
A dull piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is a fragment from the exoskeleton of a monster infused with the ancient power of the moon. Along with the vanished light, it has also lost the secrets once hidden within.

customize.name: Glowing Remains
customize.desc:
A faintly glowing piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is the remains of an exoskeleton in which a vestige of the ancient power of the moon still lingers. It emanates a deep hue that still lingers long after being separated from its body, steeped as it is in the power of the moon.
